Zahi Hawass said now that the Egyptian Museum's collection is secure from thieves, the greatest threat to the collection inside is posed by the torched ruling party headquarters building next door. What scares me is that if this building is destroyed, it will fall over the museum, Zahi Hawass said as he watched fire trucks spray water on the still smoldering NDP headquarters. Page Six reports that outgoing Google CEO Eric Schmidt is in talks with`` Parker Spitzer'' executive producer Liza McGuirk on a new show that he would host. The two first connected on the Sunday foreign-affairs program`` Fareed Zakaria GPS, which Liza McGuirk executive produced and where Eric Schmidt was a regular guest. When Eric Schmidt filmed a pilot for CNN in August, Liza McGuirk oversaw the production.
